name: Austria
startIntroPart1: By the Grace of God, all hail Kaiser Karl I, emperor of Austria! Great and holy Austria is the legal descendant of the Roman Empire through the Holy Roman Empire. As such, Austria holds preeminence upon the rulers of Christendom. Austria holds dominion over Hungary, Bohemia, the Triune Kingdom of Croatia, Bosnia, Transylvania, southern Poland and northern Italy. Despite multiple wars, Austria endures! As long as Austria stands, Christendom lives!
startIntroPart2: Your Imperial and Royal Majesty, the peoples of the Empire are asking you to help lead the Empire to victory against all those who oppose it! Will you uphold Christendom? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You dare threaten the empire? This means war!
attacked: We will only receive your utter submission!
defeated: The defeat of Austria is the death of Christendom. Dark times are upon us all.
introduction: As the emperor of Austria, you are worthy of our attention.
tradeRequest: You will have the privilege of trading with us.
uniques: +50% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

name: Montenegro
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, o holy Metropolitan Danilo I! The holy land of Montenegro is ours! We have a long road ahead of us! The Ottomans will fear us!
startIntroPart2: Your Eminence, Montenegro calls upon you to lead and protect it! Will you make Montenegro great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You will pay for your war!
uniques: +1 Sight for all land military units
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills

name: Serbia
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, all hail Stefan the First-Crowned, King of Serbia! Great and holy Serbia had arisen! No longer are we just the Grand Principality of Serbia. Nay, you are a king! We have a long road ahead of us! We will supplant Byzantium!
startIntroPart2: Your Royal Highness, Serbia calls upon you to lead it to greatness and glory! Will you make Serbia great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your lands will make a glorious addition to the kingdom of Serbia!
uniques: +1 Sight for all land military units
Melee units pay no movement cost to pillage
